description: ICS techniques mitigated by Encrypt Network Traffic, ATT&CK mitigation M0808 (v1.0)
name: Encrypt Network Traffic (M0808)

techniques.comment: The encryption of firmware should be considered to prevent adversaries from identifying possible vulnerabilities within the firmware.

Ensure that wired and/or wireless traffic is encrypted when feasible. Use best practices for authentication protocols, such as Kerberos, and ensure web traffic that may contain credentials is protected by SSL/TLS. (Citation: Keith Stouffer May 2015)
The encryption of firmware should be considered to prevent adversaries from identifying possible vulnerabilities within the firmware.
Utilize strong cryptographic techniques and protocols to prevent eavesdropping on network communications.
Utilize strong cryptographic techniques and protocols to prevent eavesdropping on network communications.  (Citation: Bastille April 2017)
